name: Over The Door Shoe Organizer with 24 Crystal Clear Pockets and Metal Hooks – Heavy Duty Hanging Shoe Storage Rack for Closet, Bathroom, Dorm – Space Saving for Shoes, Accessories, Toys (White)
short_description: 【Space-Saving Design for Small Spaces】: Transform unused door space into a neat and organized zone! This over the door shoe organizer fits standard doors and keeps your floors clutter-free — ideal for dorm rooms, apartments, or small closets. (Tip: Check your door clearance before hanging.)

【24 Clear Pockets – Find Everything at a Glance】: The 24 crystal-clear PVC pockets let you see your items instantly — perfect for shoes, toiletries, water bottles, or cleaning supplies. Each pocket is compact yet flexible, stretching slightly to hold adult or children’s shoes comfortably

【Heavy-Duty & Built to Last】: Made of thick PVC material with reinforced stitching, this organizer supports up to 60 lbs. Bronze grommets and sturdy metal hooks ensure long-lasting durability and secure hanging, even in high-traffic areas like classrooms or family entryways.

【Multi-Purpose Organizer for Every Room】: Not just for shoes! Use it for toiletries, snacks, school supplies, or cleaning products. Perfect for bathrooms, dorms, classrooms, laundry rooms, and pantries — one organizer, endless possibilities.

【Easy Installation & Foldable for Storage】: No tools required — simply hang it over any standard door using the included non-scratch hooks. When not in use, fold it flat for compact storage. Ideal for renters, college students, and anyone who loves simple organization.

product_description: Keep your footwear out of the walkway and looking new with the use of this hanging shoe organizer. This organizer is easy to access with its open pockets. It is also raised high off the ground, relieving you of the effort of bending down to pick out your shoes for the day. By keeping your footwear high off the ground, they will avoid unnecessary wear-and-tear. The abundant 10-pocket and 2-column design of this organizer allows you to store many shoes while still leaving space underneath for other storage. This shoe organizer uses 2 strong hooks to hang securely on either wire or rod closets. This hook system reduces sagging over long periods and is easy to install. The blended canvas lining is a lightweight and breathable option for storing your shoes. This is especially great for keeping your tennis, workout or seasonal footwear fresh. The soft canvas is gentle on special occasion footwear such as heels, leather shoes or other formal footwear. This hanging shoe organizer will not only help your shoes last longer by keeping them off the floor but will also keep your closet tidy. No more frantically searching for your left shoe early in the morning before work. This organizer will pair all of your footwear into their own protective cubby, giving you more time to prepare for the day ahead.

name: Cruise Ship Magnetic Door Organizer, Over The Door Organizer For Cruise Ships, Magnetic Shoe Rack - 3 Strong Anti-Scratch Magnets - Large Durable Pockets To Store Cruise Essentials 2025
short_description: ✅ Cruise Ship Essentials with Magnetic Design: Our cruise cabin organizer features 3 ultra-strong anti-scratch magnets that securely attach to any metal cabin wall or door - no hooks, no damage. It’s a cruise must-have for those sailing with Royal Caribbean, Carnival, Norwegian, and more.

🔁 Easily Reposition Anywhere in Your Cabin: Unlike fixed organizers, this magnetic shoe holder can be effortlessly moved around your cruise cabin walls and doors. Perfect when you need it accessible—but out of the way. A smarter choice than typical over the door travel organizers.

🧳 Dual Hanging Options: Magnetic & Hook: Includes 3 bonus over-the-door hooks for use at home, in hotels, or on non-cruise travels. Important Tip: Some cruise lines do not allow over-the-door hooks due to door damage risks—so leave them home or pack separately from the mesh if you cruise!

🛳️ Spacious Storage with 15 Large Pockets: Each of the 15 mesh pockets measures a generous 7.5" x 10", ideal as a cruise bathroom organizer, cruise shoe organizer, or even for baby items. Organize toiletries, shoes, sunscreen, diapers, and other cruise ship essentials with ease.

💪 Strong & Durable: Holds Up to 25 lbs. Whether using magnets or hooks, this over the door organizer cruise is built to hold up to 25 lbs. Durable mesh and reinforced stitching make it a reliable hanging organizer for cruise ship cabins or at home.

🧒 Versatile for Families & All Cruise Styles: Ideal for couples, families, and cruise essentials 2025 kids lists. Works great as a baby cruise must-have, cruise toddler essential, or even for storing flip-flops and sunscreen. A perfect gift for anyone sailing in 2025!
Made by Cruisin'Nordmoose - Your trusted cruise accessories brand for all cruise essentials & vacation must haves.
